title: CoCID: Compact Cell Imaging Device for Correlative Investigation of Hepatitis E Infection
content: Hepatitis E virus (HEV) is an emerging zoonotic viral infection, and is the leading cause of acute hepatitis worldwide [1]. The lack of in vitro model systems that support robust HEV infection [2] means there are few studies that have attempted to elucidate the steps of infection, i.e. viral entry, replication and assembly and itâ€™s effects on the host cell [3].
